info.title: Etsy
info.description: This connector uses your API key to access various Etsy.com features. It supports actions for inventory, sales orders, and shop management. All actions are based on Etsy Open API v3 which does have endpoints that are still in beta. If such as actions use the beta API, the action with include Beta in the title and will return a 501 response code.

get.description: Check to confirm connectivity to the Etsy API with an application.

post.description: Submits tracking information for a shop receipt, which creates a shop receipt Shipment entry for the given receipt ID. Each time you successfully submit tracking info, Etsy sends a notification email to the buyer User. When send BCC is true, Etsy sends shipping notifications to the seller as well. When tracking code and carrier name aren't sent, the receipt is marked as shipped only.

parameters.name: shop_id
parameters.description: The unique positive non-zero numeric ID for an Etsy Shop.

parameters.name: receipt_id
parameters.description: The receipt to submit tracking for.

tracking_code.description: The tracking code for this receipt.
tracking_code.title: Tracking Code

carrier_name.description: The carrier name for this receipt.
carrier_name.title: Carrier Name

send_bcc.description: If true, the shipping notification will be sent to the seller as well
send_bcc.title: Send BCC

post.description: Creates a new shipping profile. You can pass a country ISO code or a region when creating a shipping profile, but not both. Only one is required. You must pass either a shipping carrier ID and mail class, or both min and max delivery days.

parameters.name: shop_id
parameters.description: The unique positive non-zero numeric ID for an Etsy Shop.

title.description: The name string of this shipping profile.
title.title: Title

origin_country_iso.description: The ISO code of the country from which the listing ships.
origin_country_iso.title: Origin Country ISO

primary_cost.description: The cost of shipping to this country/region alone, measured in the store's default currency.
primary_cost.title: Primary Cost

secondary_cost.description: The cost of shipping to this country/region with another item, measured in the store's default currency.
secondary_cost.title: Secondary Cost

min_processing_time.description: The minimum time required to process to ship listings with this shipping profile.
min_processing_time.title: Minimum Processing Time

max_processing_time.description: The maximum processing time the listing needs to ship.
max_processing_time.title: Maximum Processing Time

processing_time_unit.description: The unit used to represent how long a processing time is. A week is equivalent to 5 business days.
processing_time_unit.title: Processing Time Unit

destination_country_iso.description: The ISO code of the country to which the listing ships. If null, request sets destination to destination region.
destination_country_iso.title: Destination Country ISO

destination_region.description: The code of the region to which the listing ships. A region represents a set of countries. Supported regions are Europe Union and Non-Europe Union (countries in Europe not in EU). If "none", request sets destination to destination country ISO, or "everywhere" if destination country ISO is also null.
destination_region.title: Destination Region

origin_postal_code.description: The postal code string (not necessarily a number) for the location from which the listing ships.
origin_postal_code.title: Origin Postal Code

shipping_carrier_id.description: The unique ID of a supported shipping carrier, which is used to calculate an estimated delivery date.
shipping_carrier_id.title: Shipping Carrier ID

mail_class.description: The unique ID string of a shipping carrier's mail class, which is used to calculate an estimated delivery date.
mail_class.title: Mail Class

min_delivery_days.description: The minimum number of business days a buyer can expect to wait to receive their purchased item once it has shipped.
min_delivery_days.title: Minimum Delivery Days

max_delivery_days.description: The maximum number of business days a buyer can expect to wait to receive their purchased item once it has shipped.
max_delivery_days.title: Maximum Delivery Days

get.summary: Get profile destinations by shipping profile
get.description: Retrieves a list of shipping destination objects associated with a shipping profile.

parameters.name: shop_id
parameters.description: The unique positive non-zero numeric ID for an Etsy Shop.

parameters.name: shipping_profile_id
parameters.description: The numeric ID of the shipping profile associated with the listing.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of results to return.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The number of records to skip before selecting the first result.

post.description: Creates a new shipping destination, which sets the shipping cost, carrier, and class for a destination in a shipping profile. This assigns costs using the currency of the associated shop. Set the destination using either destination country ISO or destination region; destination country ISO and destination region are mutually exclusive â€” set one or the other. Setting both triggers error 400. If the request sets neither destination country ISO nor destination region, the default destination is everywhere. You must also either assign both a shipping carrier ID and mail class or both min delivery days and max delivery days.

parameters.name: shop_id
parameters.description: The unique positive non-zero numeric ID for an Etsy Shop.

parameters.name: shipping_profile_id
parameters.description: The numeric ID of the shipping profile associated with the listing.

primary_cost.description: The cost of shipping to this country/region alone, measured in the store's default currency.
primary_cost.title: Primary Cost

secondary_cost.description: The cost of shipping to this country/region with another item, measured in the store's default currency.
secondary_cost.title: Secondary Cost

delete.description: Deletes a shipping destination and removes the destination option from every listing that uses the associated shipping profile. A shipping profile requires at least one shipping destination, so this endpoint cannot delete the final shipping destination for any shipping profile. To delete the final shipping destination from a shipping profile, you must delete the entire shipping profile.

parameters.name: shop_id
parameters.description: The unique positive non-zero numeric ID for an Etsy Shop.

parameters.name: shipping_profile_id
parameters.description: The numeric ID of the shipping profile associated with the listing.

parameters.name: shipping_profile_destination_id
parameters.description: The numeric ID of the shipping profile destination in the shipping profile associated with the listing.

put.description: Updates an existing shipping destination, which can set or reassign the shipping cost, carrier, and class for a destination.

parameters.name: shop_id
parameters.description: The unique positive non-zero numeric ID for an Etsy Shop.

parameters.name: shipping_profile_id
parameters.description: The numeric ID of the shipping profile associated with the listing.

parameters.name: shipping_profile_destination_id
parameters.description: The numeric ID of the shipping profile destinationassociated with the listing.

post.description: Creates a physical draft listing product in a shop on the Etsy channel.

parameters.name: shop_id
parameters.description: The unique positive non-zero numeric ID for an Etsy Shop.

quantity.description: The positive non-zero number of products available for purchase in the listing.
quantity.title: Quantity

title.description: The listing's title string. Valid title strings contain only letters, numbers, punctuation marks, mathematical symbols, whitespace characters, ™, ©, and ®. (regex: /[^\p{L}\p{Nd}\p{P}\p{Sm}\p{Zs}™©®]/u) You can only use the %, :, & and + characters once each.
title.title: Title

description.description: A description string of the product for sale in the listing.
description.title: Description

price.description: The positive non-zero price of the product. (Sold product listings are private) Note: The price is the minimum possible price.
price.title: Price

who_made.description: An string inidcated who made the product. Helps buyers locate the listing under the Handmade heading. Requires 'is_supply' and 'when_made'.
who_made.title: Who Made

when_made.description: A string for the era in which the maker made the product in this listing. Helps buyers locate the listing under the Vintage heading. Requires 'is_supply' and 'who_made'.
when_made.title: When Made

taxonomy_id.description: The numeric taxonomy ID of the listing. The seller manages listing taxonomy IDs for their shop.
taxonomy_id.title: Taxonomy ID

shipping_profile_id.description: The numeric ID of the shipping profile associated with the listing.
shipping_profile_id.title: Shipping Profile ID

materials.description: A array of material strings for materials used in the product. Valid materials strings contain only letters, numbers, and whitespace characters. (regex: /[^\p{L}\p{Nd}\p{Zs}]/u)
materials.title: Materials

shop_section_id.description: The numeric ID of the shop section for this listing.
shop_section_id.title: Shop Section ID

processing_min.description: The minimum number of days required to process this listing.
processing_min.title: Processing Minimum

processing_max.description: The maximum number of days required to process this listing.
processing_max.title: Processing Maximum

tags.description: An array of tag strings for the listing. Valid tag strings contain only letters, numbers, whitespace characters, -, ', ™, ©, and ®. (regex: /[^\p{L}\p{Nd}\p{Zs}-'™©®]/u)
tags.title: Tags

recipient.description: A string indicating a person for whom this product would make an appropriate gift.
recipient.title: Recipient

occasion.description: A string indicating an occassion for which this product would make an appropriate gift.
occasion.title: Occasion

styles.description: An array of style strings for this listing, each of which is free-form text string such as "Formal", or "Steampunk". A Listing may have up to two styles. Valid style strings contain only letters, numbers, and whitespace characters. (regex: /[^\p{L}\p{Nd}\p{Zs}]/u)
styles.title: Styles

item_weight.description: The numeric weight of the product measured in units set in item weight unit.
item_weight.title: Item Weight

item_length.description: The numeric length of the product measured in units set in item dimensions unit.
item_length.title: Item Length

item_width.description: The numeric width of the product measured in units set in 'item dimensions unit'.
item_width.title: Item Width

item_height.description: The numeric height of the product measured in units set in 'item dimensions unit'.
item_height.title: Item Height

item_weight_unit.description: A string defining the units used to measure the weight of the product.
item_weight_unit.title: Item Weight Unit

item_dimensions_unit.description: A string defining the units used to measure the dimensions of the product.
item_dimensions_unit.title: Item Dimensions Unit

is_personalizable.description: When true, this listing is personalizable.
is_personalizable.title: Is Personalizable

image_ids.description: An array of numeric image IDs of the images in a listing, which can include up to 10 images.
image_ids.title: Image IDs

is_supply.description: When true, tags the listing as a supply product, else indicates that it's a finished product. Helps buyers locate the listing under the Supplies heading. Requires 'who made' and 'when made'.
is_supply.title: Is Supply

is_customizable.description: When true, a buyer may contact the seller for a customized order. The default value is true when a shop accepts custom orders. Does not apply to shops that do not accept custom orders.
is_customizable.title: Is Customizable

is_taxable.description: When true, applicable shop tax rates apply to this listing at checkout.
is_taxable.title: Is Taxable

price.description: The positive non-zero price of the product. (Sold product listings are private) Note: The price is the minimum possible price.
price.title: Price

who_made.description: An string inidcated who made the product. Helps buyers locate the listing under the Handmade heading. Requires 'is_supply' and 'when_made'.
who_made.title: Who Made

when_made.description: A string for the era in which the maker made the product in this listing. Helps buyers locate the listing under the Vintage heading. Requires 'is_supply' and 'who_made'.
when_made.title: When Made

taxonomy_id.description: The numeric taxonomy ID of the listing. The seller manages listing taxonomy IDs for their shop.

shipping_profile_id.description: The numeric ID of the shipping profile associated with the listing.
shipping_profile_id.title: Shipping Profile ID

materials.description: A array of material strings for materials used in the product. Valid materials strings contain only letters, numbers, and whitespace characters. (regex: /[^\p{L}\p{Nd}\p{Zs}]/u)

shop_section_id.description: The numeric ID of the shop section for this listing.
shop_section_id.title: Shop Section ID

processing_min.description: The minimum number of days required to process this listing.
processing_min.title: Processing Minimum

processing_max.description: The maximum number of days required to process this listing.
processing_max.title: Processing Maximum

tags.description: An array of tag strings for the listing. Valid tag strings contain only letters, numbers, whitespace characters, -, ', ™, ©, and ®. (regex: /[^\p{L}\p{Nd}\p{Zs}-'™©®]/u)
tags.title: Tags

recipient.description: A string indicating a person for whom this product would make an appropriate gift.
recipient.title: Recipient

occasion.description: A string indicating an occassion for which this product would make an appropriate gift.
occasion.title: Occasion

styles.description: An array of style strings for this listing, each of which is free-form text string such as "Formal", or "Steampunk". A Listing may have up to two styles. Valid style strings contain only letters, numbers, and whitespace characters. (regex: /[^\p{L}\p{Nd}\p{Zs}]/u)
styles.title: Styles

item_weight.description: The numeric weight of the product measured in units set in item weight unit.
item_weight.title: Item Weight

item_length.description: The numeric length of the product measured in units set in item dimensions unit.
item_length.title: Item Length

item_width.description: The numeric width of the product measured in units set in 'item dimensions unit'.
item_width.title: Item Width

item_height.description: The numeric height of the product measured in units set in 'item dimensions unit'.
item_height.title: Item Height

item_weight_unit.description: A string defining the units used to measure the weight of the product.
item_weight_unit.title: Item Weight Unit

item_dimensions_unit.description: A string defining the units used to measure the dimensions of the product.
item_dimensions_unit.title: Item Dimensions Unit

is_personalizable.description: When true, this listing is personalizable.
is_personalizable.title: Is Personalizable

image_ids.description: An array of numeric image IDs of the images in a listing, which can include up to 10 images.
image_ids.title: Image IDs

is_supply.description: When true, tags the listing as a supply product, else indicates that it's a finished product. Helps buyers locate the listing under the Supplies heading. Requires 'who made' and 'when made'.
is_supply.title: Is Supply

is_customizable.description: When true, a buyer may contact the seller for a customized order. The default value is true when a shop accepts custom orders. Does not apply to shops that do not accept custom orders.
is_customizable.title: Is Customizable

is_taxable.description: When true, applicable shop tax rates apply to this listing at checkout.
is_taxable.title: Is Taxable

featured_ rank.description: The positive non-zero numeric position in the featured listings of the shop with rank 1 listings appearing in the left-most position in featured listing on a shop’s home page.
featured_ rank.title: Featured Rank

should_auto_renew.description: When true, renews a listing for four months upon expriation. If set to true when previously false, etsy.com renews the listing before it expires, but the renewal period starts immidiately rather than extending the listing's expiration date. Any unused time remaining on the listing is lost. Renewals result in charges to a user's bill.
should_auto_renew.title: Should Auto Renew

type.description: Indicates whether the listing is physical or a digital download.
type.title: Type

channels.description: An array of enumerated channel ID strings. A channel is a venue for sellers to reach buyers in order to make sales.
channels.title: Channels

post.description: Uploads a new file for a digital listing, or associates an existing file with a specific listing. You must either provide the listing file ID of an existing file, or the name and binary file data for a file to upload. Associating an existing file to a physical listing converts the physical listing into a digital listing, which removes all shipping costs and any product and inventory variations.

get.description: Retrieves the inventory record for a listing. Listings you did not edit using the Etsy.com inventory tools have no inventory records. This endpoint returns SKU data if you are the owner of the inventory records being fetched.

put.description: Updates the inventory for a listing identified by a listing ID. The update fails if the supplied values for product SKU, offering quantity, and/or price are incompatible with values in on property fields. When setting a price, assign a float equal to amount divided by divisor as specified in the money resource.

parameters.name: listing_id
parameters.description: The numeric ID for the listing associated to this transaction.

price_on_property.title: Price on Property

quantity_on_property.description: An array of unique listing property ID integers for the properties that change the quantity of the products, if any. For example, if you stock specific quantities of different colored products in the same listing, then this array contains the property ID for color.
quantity_on_property.title: Quantity on Property

sku_on_property.description: An array of unique listing property ID integers for the properties that change the product SKU, if any. For example, if you use specific skus for different colored products in the same listing, then this array contains the property ID for color.
sku_on_property.title: SKU on Property

ShopListing.title: ShopListing
ShopListing.description: A listing from a shop, which contains a product quantity, title, description, price, etc.

listing_id.description: The numeric ID for the [listing](/documentation/reference#tag/ShopListing) associated to this transaction.

user_id.description: The numeric ID for the [user](/documentation/reference#tag/User) posting the listing.

shop_id.description: The unique positive non-zero numeric ID for an Etsy Shop.

title.description: The listing's title string. Valid title strings contain only letters, numbers, punctuation marks, mathematical symbols, whitespace characters, â„¢, Â©, and Â®. (regex: /[^\\p{L}\\p{Nd}\\p{P}\\p{Sm}\\p{Zs}â„¢Â©Â®]/u) You can only use the %, :, & and + characters once each.

description.description: A description string of the product for sale in the listing.

creation_timestamp.description: The listing\'s creation time, in epoch seconds.

ending_timestamp.description: The listing\'s expiration time, in epoch seconds.

original_creation_timestamp.description: The listing\'s creation time, in epoch seconds.

last_modified_timestamp.description: The time of the last update to the listing, in epoch seconds.

state_timestamp.description: The date and time of the last state change of this listing.

quantity.description: The positive non-zero number of products available for purchase in the listing. Note: The listing quantity is the sum of available offering quantities. You can request the quantities for individual offerings from the ListingInventory resource using the [getListingInventory](/documentation/reference#operation/getListingInventory) endpoint.

shop_section_id.description: The numeric ID of a section in a specific Etsy shop.

featured_rank.description: The positive non-zero numeric position in the featured listings of the shop, with rank 1 listings appearing in the left-most position in featured listing on a shopâ€™s home page.

url.description: The full URL to the listing's page on Etsy.

num_favorers.description: The number of users who marked this Listing a favorite.

non_taxable.description: When true, applicable [shop](/documentation/reference#tag/Shop) tax rates do not apply to this listing at checkout.

is_customizable.description: When true, a buyer may contact the seller for a customized order. The default value is true when a shop accepts custom orders. Does not apply to shops that do not accept custom orders.

is_personalizable.description: When true, this listing is personalizable. The default value is null.

personalization_is_required.description: When true, this listing requires personalization. The default value is null.

personalization_char_count_max.description: This an integer value representing the maximum length for the personalization message entered by the buyer.

personalization_instructions.description: When true, this listing requires personalization. The default value is null.

listing_type.description: An enumerated type string that indicates whether the listing is physical or a digital download.

tags.description: A list of tag strings for the listing. Valid tag strings contain only letters, numbers, whitespace characters, -, ', â„¢, Â©, and Â®. (regex: /[^\\p{L}\\p{Nd}\\p{Zs}\\-'â„¢Â©Â®]/u) Default value is null.

materials.description: A list of material strings for materials used in the product. Valid materials strings contain only letters, numbers, and whitespace characters. (regex: /[^\\p{L}\\p{Nd}\\p{Zs}]/u) Default value is null.

shipping_profile_id.description: The numeric ID of the [shipping profile](/documentation/reference#tag/ShopListing-ShippingProfile) associated with the listing.

processing_min.description: The minimum number of days required to process this listing. Default value is null.

processing_max.description: The maximum number of days required to process this listing. Default value is null.

is_supply.description: When true, tags the listing as a supply product, else indicates that it's a finished product. Helps buyers locate the listing under the Supplies heading. Requires 'who_made' and 'when_made'.

item_weight.description: The numeric weight of the product measured in units set in \'item_weight_unit\'. Default value is null. If set, the value must be greater than 0.

item_length.description: The numeric length of the product measured in units set in \'item_dimensions_unit\'. Default value is null. If set, the value must be greater than 0.

item_width.description: The numeric width of the product measured in units set in \'item_dimensions_unit\'. Default value is null. If set, the value must be greater than 0.

item_height.description: The numeric length of the product measured in units set in \'item_dimensions_unit\'. Default value is null. If set, the value must be greater than 0.

is_private.description: When true, this is a private listing intendend for a specific buyer and hidden from shop view.

style.description: An array of style strings for this listing, each of which is free-form text string such as \"Formal\", or \"Steampunk\". A Listing may have up to two styles. Valid style strings contain only letters, numbers, and whitespace characters. (regex: /[^\\p{L}\\p{Nd}\\p{Zs}]/u) Default value is null.

file_data.description: A string describing the files attached to a digital listing.

has_variations.description: When true, the listing has variations.

should_auto_renew.description: When true, renews a listing for four months upon expriation. If set to true when previously false, etsy.com renews the listing before it expires, but the renewal period starts immidiately rather than extending the listing's expiration date. Any unused time remaining on the listing is lost. Renewals result in charges to a user's bill.

language.description: The IETF language tag for the default language of the listing. Ex: `de`, `en`, `es`, `fr`, `it`, `ja`, `nl`, `pl`, `pt`, `ru`.

taxonomy_id.description: The numeric taxonomy ID of the listing. The seller manages listing taxonomy IDs for their shop.  [See SellerTaxonomy](/documentation/reference#tag/SellerTaxonomy) for more information.

SellerTaxonomyNodes.title: SellerTaxonomyNodes

SellerTaxonomyNode.title: SellerTaxonomyNode
SellerTaxonomyNode.description: A taxonomy node in the seller taxonomy tree.

id.description: The unique numeric ID of an Etsy taxonomy node, which is a metadata category for listings organized into the seller taxonomy hierarchy tree. For example, the \"shoes\" taxonomy node (ID: 1429, level: 1) is higher in the hierarchy than \"girls' shoes\" (ID: 1440, level: 2). The taxonomy nodes assigned to a listing support access to specific standardized product scales and properties. For example, listings assigned the taxonomy nodes \"shoes\" or \"girls' shoes\" support access to the \"EU\" shoe size scale with its associated property names and IDs for EU shoe sizes, such as property `value_id`:\"1394\", and `name`:\"38\".

level.description: The integer depth of this taxonomy node in the seller taxonomy tree, with roots at level 0.

name.description: The name string for this taxonomy node.

parent_id.description: The numeric taxonomy ID of the parent of this node.

children.description: An array of taxonomy nodes for all the direct children of this taxonomy node in the seller taxanomy tree.

full_path_taxonomy_ids.description: An array of `taxonomy_id`s including this node and all of its direct parents in the seller taxonomy tree up to a root node. They are listed in order from root to leaf.

offerings.description: A list of product offering entries for this product.

property_id.description: The unique ID of an Etsy [listing property](/documentation/reference#operation/getListingProperties).

value_ids.description: An array of unique IDs of multiple Etsy [listing property](/documentation/reference#operation/getListingProperties) values. For example, if your listing offers different sizes of a product, then the value ID list contains value IDs for each size.

scale_id.description: The numeric ID of a single Etsy.com measurement scale. For example, for shoe size, there are three `scale_id`s available - *UK*, *US/Canada*, and *EU*, where *US/Canada* has `scale_id` 19.

property_name.description: The name of the property, in the requested locale language.

values.description: A list of property value entries for this product.

Recipient.title: Recipient
Recipient.description: An enumerated string indicating a person for whom this product would make an appropriate gift. Default value is null.

sort_on.title: sort_on
sort_on.description: The value to sort a search result of listings on. NOTE: sort_on only works when combined with one of the search options (keywords, region, etc.).

sort_order.title: sort_order
sort_order.description: The ascending(up) or descending(down) order to sort listings by. NOTE: sort_order only works when combined with one of the search options (keywords, region, etc.).

State.title: State
State.description: An enumerated string from any of: active or inactive. Note: Setting a draft listing to active will also publish the listing on etsy.com.

state2.title: state2
state2.description: An enumerated string from any of: active or inactive. Note: Setting a draft listing to active will also publish the listing on etsy.com.

Type.title: Type
Type.description: The type of the shipping upgrade. Domestic (0) or international (1).

type1.title: type1
type1.description: An enumerated type string that indicates whether the listing is physical or a digital download.

products.description: A JSON array of products available in a listing, even if only one product. All field names in the JSON blobs are lowercase.

price_on_property.description: An array of unique [listing property](/documentation/reference#operation/getListingProperties) ID integers for the properties that change product prices, if any. For example, if you charge specific prices for different sized products in the same listing, then this array contains the property ID for size.

quantity_on_property.description: An array of unique [listing property](/documentation/reference#operation/getListingProperties) ID integers for the properties that change the quantity of the products, if any. For example, if you stock specific quantities of different colored products in the same listing, then this array contains the property ID for color.

sku_on_property.description: An array of unique [listing property](/documentation/reference#operation/getListingProperties) ID integers for the properties that change the product SKU, if any. For example, if you use specific skus for different colored products in the same listing, then this array contains the property ID for color.

variation_images.description: A list of variation image data.

when_made2.title: when_made2
when_made2.description: An enumerated string for the era in which the maker made the product in this listing. Helps buyers locate the listing under the Vintage heading. Requires 'is_supply' and 'who_made'.

WhenMade.title: WhenMade
WhenMade.description: An enumerated string for the era in which the maker made the product in this listing. Helps buyers locate the listing under the Vintage heading. Requires 'is_supply' and 'who_made'.

who_made2.title: who_made2
who_made2.description: An enumerated string inidcated who made the product. Helps buyers locate the listing under the Handmade heading. Requires 'is_supply' and 'when_made'.

WhoMade.title: WhoMade
WhoMade.description: An enumerated string inidcated who made the product. Helps buyers locate the listing under the Handmade heading. Requires 'is_supply' and 'when_made'.
